DOC.brief_summary: The aim study comparison efficacy intravenous ketorolac intranasal desmopressin renal colic patient pain control .
DOC.brief_title: Intranasal Desmopressin v IV Ketorolac Renal Colic Pain Control
DOC.detailed_description: 40 renal colic patient divide 2 group randomly , one group receive 30mg intravenous Ketorolac 4 puff nasal Normal Saline receive 40 microgram nasal Desmopressin 1cc intravenous Normal Saline . Pain Score drug administration , also 10 , 30 60 minute drug administration measure bye Visual Analogue Scale ( VAS ) .
DOC.criteria: renal colic patient history hypertension cardiac disease pregnant patient use analgesic within 4 hour intervention
